Package rooms

Class Room

java.lang.Object
rooms.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bathroom, Bedroom, Gym, Kitchen, Livingroom, Office
public abstract class Room extends Object
Abstract class representing a room in the castle.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(Key key)
      Constructor to initialize the Room with a specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated with the room.

  • Method Details

    • getKey

      public Key getKey()
      Retrieves the key associated with the room.
      Returns:
      The key object associated with the room.

    • enterRoom

      public void enterRoom(Server.ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Adds a client (player) to the room. Notifies all clients in the room when two players are present.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler representing the player to add.

    • leaveRoom

      public void leaveRoom(Server.ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Removes a client (player) from the room. Updates the occupied status based on remaining clients.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - The ClientHandler representing the player to remove.
